question: Lucas was a pen pal with 10 people. He stopped being penpals with 3 of them. They each send 4 letters a week that are 8 pages long. He responds in kind. He can write a page every 13 minutes. How many hours does he spend writing a week?
answer:
Lucas is penpals with 10-3=<<10-3=7>>7 people
Thus he gets 7*4=<<7*4=28>>28 letters a week
So he writes 28*8=<<28*8=224>>224 pages a week
So he writes for 224*13=<<224*13=2912>>2912 minutes a week
So he writes 2912/60=<<2912/60=48>>48 hours a week
#### 48
